description: A configuration file for the PrairieLearn server.
title: Backend Config

___authType.description: The type of authentication to use.

___postgresqlDatabase.description: The database for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.

___amqpResultQueue.description: Name of the grading results message queue

___amqpAddress.description: Address of the message queue server, or null to disable

___secretKey.description: Secret key for authenticating users (should be a long random string).

___logFilename.description: Filename to use for server logging.

___serverType.description: The type of server to start.

___postgresqlUser.description: The user for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.

___serverPort.description: The TCP port number for the server.

___amqpGradingQueue.description: Name of the grading message queue

___postgresqlHost.description: The host for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.

___dbAddress.description: The address for connecting to the database.
